pages.name: Ritual of the Green Grove
pages.text: Use a Ritual Diviner for easier contruction.
Grows crops within its area.$(br2)$(#0000aa)Water Runes: 4$()$(br)$(#00aa00)Earth Runes: 4$()$(br2)Total Runes: 8

pages.title: Raw
pages.text: Increases the speed of all of the ritual operations depending on the total Will in the Aura.

pages.title: Corrosive
pages.text: Entities within range are attacked by nearby plants, leeching away their life.

pages.title: Vengeful
pages.text: Increases the rate that a growth tick is successful.

pages.title: Destructive
pages.text: Growing range is increased based on total Will.

pages.title: Steadfast
pages.text: Seeds are replanted and blocks are hydrated within the Hydration range.
